column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Tenzin says : " All right , who 's next ? "
#Text=Yung says : " I 'm not sure I want to shave my head . "
#Text=Tenzin says : " That 's fine , shaving your head is a personal choice . "
#Text=Daw says : " Wait , what ? "
#Text=Tenzin says : " Anyone else ?
#Text=Maybe we should give them a break .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Jinora , I have this under control " Tenzin says : " Concentrate !
#Text=Remember , airbenders move like the wind .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Stay light on your feet , and you 'll never feel the stinging rash cactus .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Everyone is waiting for you , Bumi .
#Text=If you do n't make it over the next thirty seconds , they 'll all have to run through the course again !
#Text=" Airbenders says : " You can do it , Bumi !
#Text=Come on !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Get back up the wall , recruit !
#Text=You 're letting your fellow airbenders down .
#Text=" Bumi says : " I 'm finished !
#Text=I 've never wanted to be an airbender and I 'm too old to be back in boot camp .
#Text=Count me out !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Fine , quit !
#Text=We do n't need your attitude in the new Air Nation .
#Text=" Daw says : " Master Tenzin , when do we get to go home and visit our families ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Go home ?
#Text=You just got here .
#Text=" Female airbender says : " When 's dinner ?
#Text=I 'm starving .
#Text=" Yung says : " Can I change out of my robe now ?
#Text=It 's itchy .
#Text=" Kai says : " This is just as bad as the Earth Queen 's prison .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I 'm tired of all this complaining !
#Text=Jinora , take over !
#Text=" Jinora says : " Does this mean , I 'm the master now ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Yes , just lead them through some basic exercises .
#Text=" Jinora says : " Well , since I 'm a master , when do you think I can get my tattoos ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " What brought this on ?
#Text=" Jinora says : " I was just talking to Kai , and he was asking me , so - " Tenzin says : " Kai !
#Text=What does he know about when you should get tattoos ?
#Text=The answer is " no " !
#Text=You 're just a little girl .
#Text=" Jinora says : " I 'm not a little girl anymore .
#Text=I can airbend just as well as you .
#Text=I know everything about our culture and history , and I have a stronger connection with the spirits that you ever will .
#Text=Lead your own class !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Ikki , Meelo , you 're up .
#Text=Just lead them through the Bagua circle .
#Text=" Meelo says : " Look to your left !
#Text=Look to your right !
#Text=One of those people will not make it out of here alive .
#Text="
